Class Breadcrumb<S,V>

java.lang.Object
java.util.AbstractCollection<S>
java.util.AbstractList<S>
java.util.Vector<S>
java.util.Stack<S>
ca.phon.ui.jbreadcrumb.Breadcrumb<S,V>
Type Parameters:
S - the type of state
V - the type of value associated with a state
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Iterable<S>, Collection<S>, List<S>, RandomAccess, SequencedCollection<S>
public class Breadcrumb<S,V> extends Stack<S>
A Breadcrumb maintains a linear navigation history.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Breadcrumb

      public Breadcrumb()
      Creates a new empty Breadcrumb.

  • Method Details

    • containsState

      public boolean containsState(S state)
      Gets whether or not the breadcrumb contains a state.
      Parameters:
      state - the state to look for
      Returns:
      true if the breadcrumb contains the given state, false otherwise

    • getCurrentState

      public S getCurrentState()
      Gets the current state of this breadcrumb.
      Returns:
      the current state, or null if no states available

    • getCurrentValue

      public V getCurrentValue()
      Gets the value associated with the current state of this breadcrumb.
      Returns:
      the current state's value, or null if no states available

    • getIndexOfState

      public int getIndexOfState(S state)
      Index of given state
      Parameters:
      state - the state to find
      Returns:
      index of state or -1

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Empties this breadcrumb.
      Specified by:
      clear in interface Collection<S>
      Specified by:
      clear in interface List<S>
      Overrides:
      clear in class Vector<S>

    • peekState

      public S peekState(int index)
      Gets the state at the specified index from the current state.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the state to peek at
      Returns:
      the state at the given index (from the current state)
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of range (i.e., index < 0 || index > size())

    • popState

      public Breadcrumb.EntrySet<S,V> popState()
      Removes and returns the current state from this breadcrumb.
      Returns:
      the removed state and value as an EntrySet, or null if breadcrumb is empty

    • gotoState

      public void gotoState(S state)
      Goes to the given state. If the state is part of this breadcrumb, all states following it will be removed.
      Parameters:
      state - the state to go to

    • set

      public void set(List<Breadcrumb.EntrySet<S,V>> states)
      Sets the complete state of the breadcrumb to a given list of state/value pairs.
      Parameters:
      states - the new set of states

    • addState

      public void addState(S state)
      Append the given state to this breadcrumb with a null value.
      Parameters:
      state - the state

    • addState

      public void addState(S state, V value)
      Append the given state/value pair to this breadcrumb.
      Parameters:
      state - the state
      value - the value to associate with the given state

    • getStates

      public List<S> getStates()
      Gets the set of states as an immutable list.
      Returns:
      the list of states

    • getValues

      public Collection<V> getValues()
      Gets the set of values as an immutable list.
      Returns:
      the list of values

    • getValue

      public V getValue(S state)
      Get value for given state.
      Parameters:
      state - the state to get the value for
      Returns:
      the value associated with the state

    • setValue

      public void setValue(S state, V value)
      Set value for given state. The state must already exist.
      Parameters:
      state - the state to set the value for
      value - the value to set

    • addBreadcrumbListener

      public void addBreadcrumbListener(BreadcrumbListener<S,V> listener)
      Adds a breadcrumb listener to this breadcrumb.
      Parameters:
      listener - the listener to add

    • removeBreadcrumbListener

      public void removeBreadcrumbListener(BreadcrumbListener<S,V> listener)
      Removes a breadcrumb listener from this breadcrumb.
      Parameters:
      listener - the listener to remove

    • fireStateChanged

      protected void fireStateChanged(S oldState, S newState)
      Fires a state changed event to all registered listeners.
      Parameters:
      oldState - the previous state
      newState - the new current state

    • fireStateAdded

      protected void fireStateAdded(S state, V value)
      Fires a state added event to all registered listeners.
      Parameters:
      state - the state that was added
      value - the value associated with the state
